title: SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls, 3.5 inch 4 oz Clear Glass Bowls for Condiments, Small Glass Bowls, and Pinch Bowls (6 Pack)
descriptions:
Product Name: SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls

Introducing the SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls, a set of six elegant and functional bowls perfect for a variety of uses in your kitchen or food service establishment. Each bowl measures 3.5 inches in size and has a volume capacity of 4 oz, making them perfect for holding and serving condiments, spices, ingredients, candy, desserts, ice cream, and more.

Crafted from high-quality glass, these bowls are not only stylish but also durable and long-lasting. They are stronger and more durable than traditional glass, making them resistant to chipping and cracking. The non-porous glass material ensures that the bowls do not absorb odors or stains, making them easy to clean and maintain.

The SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls are versatile and can be used in a variety of environments, including restaurants, cafes, bakeries, and homes. They are perfect for serving condiments, holding loose tea leaves or spices, and using for ingredient prep. The sleek and simple design of these bowls adds a touch of elegance to any setting.

These bowls are also convenient and easy to store. They are stackable, which saves space in your kitchen or pantry. Additionally, they are microwave and dishwasher safe, making them easy to heat up or clean up after use.

Get your set of SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls today and elevate your food presentation and storage game!
